/**
 * PetCareApp - Disease Alert Service
 * API dla alertów epidemiologicznych z integracją (WOAH, ADNS, GIW, EFSA)
 * @author VS
 */import{diseaseAlertApi}from'./api';export const diseaseAlertService={/**
     * Pobranie alertów z zewnętrznych źródeł
     */async getAlerts(){let filters=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};const params=new URLSearchParams();if(filters.country)params.append('country',filters.country);if(filters.source)params.append('source',filters.source);if(filters.status)params.append('status',filters.status);if(filters.severity)params.append('severity',filters.severity);const response=await diseaseAlertApi.get("/alerts?".concat(params));return response.data;},/**
     * Pobranie dostępnych źródeł danych
     */async getSources(){const response=await diseaseAlertApi.get('/alerts/sources');return response.data;},/**
     * Pobranie listy monitorowanych chorób
     */async getDiseases(){const response=await diseaseAlertApi.get('/alerts/diseases');return response.data;},/**
     * Pobranie informacji o strefach ASF
     */async getASFZones(){const response=await diseaseAlertApi.get('/alerts/asf');return response.data;},/**
     * Pobranie szczegółów alertu
     */async getAlertById(alertId){const response=await diseaseAlertApi.get("/alerts/".concat(alertId));return response.data;},/**
     * Pobranie aktywnych alertów
     */async getActiveAlerts(){const response=await diseaseAlertApi.get('/alerts/active');return response.data;},/**
     * Alerty w pobliżu lokalizacji
     */async getNearbyAlerts(lat,lng){let radius=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:100;const response=await diseaseAlertApi.get("/alerts/nearby?lat=".concat(lat,"&lng=").concat(lng,"&radius=").concat(radius));return response.data;},/**
     * Pobranie bazy chorób
     */async getDiseases(){let filters=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};const params=new URLSearchParams();if(filters.category)params.append('category',filters.category);if(filters.zoonotic!==undefined)params.append('zoonotic',filters.zoonotic);if(filters.notifiable!==undefined)params.append('notifiable',filters.notifiable);const response=await diseaseAlertApi.get("/diseases?".concat(params));return response.data;},/**
     * Szczegóły choroby
     */async getDiseaseById(diseaseId){const response=await diseaseAlertApi.get("/diseases/".concat(diseaseId));return response.data;},/**
     * Statystyki alertów
     */async getStats(){const response=await diseaseAlertApi.get('/stats');return response.data;},/**
     * Lista województw
     */async getRegions(){const response=await diseaseAlertApi.get('/regions');return response.data;}};export default diseaseAlertService;
